amendment.description: Amendment requires the agency to conduct studies of the organization, delivery, and financing of health services in order to determine the cost and quality effects of various methods of substantially increasing the number of individuals in the United States who have access to health services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 11 printed in the Congressional Record to require studies of methods of the organization, delivery, and fianacing of health services to determine the cost and quality effects of various methods of increasing the number of individuals who have access to health services.

action.text: Tierney amendment (A010) modified by unanimous consent. The modification clarifies that the studies shall include an examination of financial impacts of a range of health reforms to include but are not limited a single payor insurance protram.
On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A010) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
